Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people communicating over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can show how the string telephone uses sound to send and receive messages.
The student can demonstrate that the string is tight and connects two cups or cans for effective communication.
The student can illustrate that the device allows communication without electrical or modern technology.
The student can include their understanding of how this simple device solves the problem of communicating over a distance.
